name: Moon Dust
longDescription:
MOON DUST is our best-selling product made with natural, organic ingredients. MOON DUST thickens the hair and creates a flexible, textured look that's soft to the touch. The result is best summarized as effortless style. Look like you spent time on your hair, without actually spending time on your hair.

Dry, matte finish.
Touchable, all-day hold.
Adds texture, thickness, and volume.
Works well for second-day hair, absorbs oil.
Hair healthy, made with natural and organic ingredients.
Easy to use, spray application.

Best suited for straight, wavy, and curly hair types. Apply to damp hair for increased hold. Apply to dry hair for added texture.

name: Solar Wind
longDescription:
Our take on the men's grooming classic, sea salt spray. We've added a little more moisture and removed some of the excess grit you might've come to expect from other sea salt sprays on the market. The result is an easy to use spray that adds beachy texture, a medium hold, and touchable volume. SOLAR WIND is perfect for creating messy, lived-in looks or building natural volume with a blow dryer.

Builds volume and beach-hair texture.
Medium hold.
Natural finish.
Provides moisture and doesn't over-dry.
UVA/UVB protection to fight against sun damage.
Hair healthy, made with natural and organic ingredients.

Best suited for straight, wavy, and curly hair types. Apply to damp or dry hair. Applying to damp hair will increase the beach-hair effect.

name: Star Dew
longDescription:
A unique grooming cream that combines heat protection, conditioning, and light control for unparalleled versatility. STAR DEW is our workhorse product. It's great when used by itself, but even better when combined with SOLAR WIND and MOON DUST. Use it to build a solid foundation for other styles, and to get the best results when blow drying. Perfect for medium to longer length hairstyles.

Natural finish.
Low to medium hold.
Adds definition to medium and longer styles.
Natural heat protection for safe blow dryer use.
Works as a curl enhancer and locks in moisture.
Hair healthy, made with natural and organic ingredients.

Best suited for straight, wavy, curly, and coiled hair types. Apply to damp hair before blow drying to build weightless volume. Allow to dry naturally for increased texture and hold.
